items.sentence: I don\'t think Tom knows Mary is still in Boston.
I don\'t think Tom knows anybody who can do that.
I don\'t think Tom likes watching baseball on TV.
Tom accidentally bumped into Mary and apologized.
Tom advised the job applicant to redo her resume.
If you want something done right, do it yourself.
Tom told Mary that he was planning on doing that.
Tom told Mary that she needed to be home by 2:30.
Tom told Mary that she should go to the hospital.
Tom was scolded by his boss getting to work late.
Tom was sitting on the porch, reading a magazine.
Tom was talking to Mary with a smile on his face.
Here comes another bus load of Canadian tourists.
Hey, you want to have a lot of fun? Come with us.
Tom knows Mary can\'t resist chocolate ice cream.
Tom knows he\'s not very good at speaking French.
Tom has a pretty good idea who stole his trumpet.
Tom has been singing a lot of sad songs recently.
Where do you suppose you\'ll spend your vacation?
Tom is the one who\'s going to help Mary do that.
